action_description: This action will stop playing radio on a LaMetric device.
This Action will display notification on your LaMetric Time.
This Action will update the Indicator app on your LaMetric Time.
This action will start the timer on a LaMetric device.
This action will activate specific app on a LaMetric device.
This action will start stopwatch on a LaMetric Time device.
This action will pause stopwatch on a LaMetric Time device.
This action will display notification on your LaMetric device. The notification will stay on screen until dismissed.
This action will reset the timer on a LaMetric device.
This action will set or update a clock face on your LaMetric device.
This action will reset stopwatch on a LaMetric device.
This action will pause the timer on a LaMetric device.
This action will start playing radio on a LaMetric Time device.
